channel.title: [WIP]Dragon Weapon Replacement Set - PUBLIC RELEASE[WIP]
channel.description:
[b]If you so much as click this topic, leave a reply[/b]
[B]Download now available![/b]
Updates will still be made should problems occur. Well, ive decided to make a dragon weapon replacement set, since for the most part, Jagex's version is terrible (thats just my opinion, dont start flame). I will not be releasing this replacement package until I have finished All the Weapons.
[b]Currently Working on : Dragon Mace[/b]
[B]Estimated Release Date : September 27/2009 [/b]
Progress [b]▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬[/b]
Inv Model for weapons [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/invmodel.jpg[/img]
[U][B]Weapons Finished[/B][/U]
[ul][li]Dragon LongSword [V2][/li] [li]Dragon Scimitar[V2][/li] [li]Dragon Two-Handed[V2][/li] [li]Dragon BattleAxe[V1][/li] [li]Dragon Halberd[V1][/li] [li]Dragon Spear[V2][/li] [li]Dragon Dagger[V1][/li][/ul]
[s][U][B]What's Being Worked on[/B][/U][/s]
[ul][s][list][li]Dragon Mace[/li] [li]Dragon Hatchet[/li][/list][/s][/ul]
[u]Dragon Longsword[/u] Blender Renders: [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DragonSword.jpg[/img]
MetaSequoia Render [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/Dragonswordmeta-1.jpg[/img]
Wire Frame [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/Screenshot.jpg[/img]
Version 2 [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DragonLongswordV2.jpg[/img]
[u]Dragon Scimitar[/u] Blender Render [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DragonScimitar.jpg[/img]
MetaSequoia Renders [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DragonScimitarmeta1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DragonScimitarmeta2.jpg[/img]
Wire Frame [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DragonScimitarscreenshot.jpg[/img]
Version 2 [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DragonScimitarV2.jpg[/img]
[u]Dragon Two-Handed[/u] Blender Render [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DragonTwo-Handed2.jpg[/img]
MetaSequoia Renders [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DragonTwo-Handedmeta.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DragonTwo-Handedmeta2.jpg[/img]
Wire Frame [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DragonTwo-HandedScreenshot.jpg[/img]
Version 2 [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DragonTwo-handedV2.jpg[/img]
[u]Dragon Battle Axe[/u] Blender Render [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DragonBattleaxe.jpg[/img]
MetaSequoia Render [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/BattleAxeMeta1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/BattleAxeMeta2.jpg[/img]

[u]Dragon Halberd[/u] Note that the handle base has been made lighter brown.
Blender Render [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DragonHalberd.jpg[/img]

Credits: 95% to me 5% to Mr PotatoHead's datmaker
By downloading this file, you agree not to recreate, or take credit for my work. If you wish to edit my models, pm me for permission to do so.
please comment if you download.

item.title: [WIP]Dragon Weapon Replacement Set - PUBLIC RELEASE[WIP]
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“XxX Jakey XxX, post:80, topic:303291”]erm the Ints r confussing lol, can u make it look like these
FOR EXAMPLE::

if(i == 8765)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;
class8.anInt174 = 14125; //
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.anInt181 = 750; //zoom increase will make it smaller
class8.anInt190 = 126; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you
class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle
class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right
class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up
class8.anInt204 = 28;
class8.anInt165 = 14123;//male wearing
class8.anInt200 = 14123;//female wearing
class8.anInt204 = 28;
class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown
class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves
class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.aString170 = “Chopper Hat”;//Name of the new item
class8.aByteArray178 = “A Hat worn by Braiton”.getBytes();
}

AND YES DYLAN AL CREDITS WILL GO TO U,
you did a awsome job.[/quote]
im not making ints. the ints are the same as the origional d weps. if u wanna make ints u can use an itemdump.

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP]Dragon Weapon Replacement Set - PUBLIC RELEASE[WIP]

erm the Ints r confussing lol, can u make it look like these

if(i == 8765)

class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];

class8.anInt174 = 14125; //

class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle
class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right
class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up
class8.anInt204 = 28;
class8.anInt165 = 14123;//male wearing

class8.anInt204 = 28;
class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown

class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.aString170 = “Chopper Hat”;//Name of the new item
class8.aByteArray178 = “A Hat worn by Braiton”.getBytes();
}

AND YES DYLAN AL CREDITS WILL GO TO U,
you did a awsome job.

item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“shadow43, post:65, topic:303291”]Some Nice models ty for sharing of them to everybody

You could add all ints ant some new item id so it would be bether. we don’t have to write allways add model id I’m new in models adding so don’t flame me if I’m wrong.[/quote]
